SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, B.code AS board__code FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id INNER JOIN `board` AS B ON A.boardId = B.id WHERE B.id = #{boardId} ORDER BY A.id DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
